Name: Automatum
About the game: AUTOMATUM Automatum is a 2D action and platform game with a dark pixel art style, where you control a small alien. With his ability to parasyte bodies you will resolve puzzles, fight and make your way through the levels. You will unlock new abilities that combined with your skill will let you face all kinds of challenges. A constant feeling of improvement and control over this pile of human flesh that serves as carriage towards your precious freedom. • 10 hours of gameplay • High difficulty • 10 levels • Great challenges • Hidden collectibles
